oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Jackson portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Andrew Jackson (1767-1845) in military dress by Ralph E. W. Earl, painted in 1833. Portait from waist up. He holds a sabor in his hand, and other hand is on his waist.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845
Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845;Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845. Works. 1986;Southern States--History--War of 1812
Generals;Presidents;Uniforms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Earl, Ralph Eleaser Whiteside, approximately 1785-1838
